name: City Race 3D
description:
If you like parkour and want to experience the feeling of a fun race, jumping and racing everywhere around the city, but you do not know how to parkor, then you need to download CITY RACE 3D now!

This is guaranteed to be the best fun run race game for free you can ever find. Find out yourself how wild and free it field to run race around the city, and in 3D! And did we mention this fun run race game includes music? That’s right! Another Amanotegame with music and and 3d run on an obstacle course! But be careful! This race is all fun and game until you spleef!

Let’s see how far you can reach in this 3d fun run!

How to play:
Drag to control your character.
Follow the obstacle course and the beat.
Don’t spleef!

Download this best fun race game for free now!
